contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|Boulon (Calvados)|date=December 2008}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Boulon |image = BOULON- Church, cemetery and memorial .jpg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Bretteville-sur-Laize |INSEE = 14090 |postal code = 14220 |mayor = Michel StÃ©phan |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Cingal |longitude = -0.3917 |latitude = 49.0486 |elevation m = 100 |elevation min m = 29 |elevation max m = 142 |area km2 = 14.96 |population = 583 |population date = 2006 }} '''Boulon''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left| 1962|457| 1968|406| 1975|458| 1982|589| 1990|592| 1999|554| 2008|583 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Commons category|Boulon}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
